p.k: Mr Newbold shuts himself in his house to avoid Mrs Featherstone. Granville decides that his terrified neighbour might be more open to the widow's advances if he thought she had an exciting past - so decides to invent one. Cast: David Jason, James Baxter, Stephanie Cole, Johnny Vegas, Maggie Ollerenshaw, Nina Wadia. Director: Dewi Humphreys.
